hero.description: From WhatsApp menus to smart reservations, we provide all the tools you need to delight customers and skyrocket revenue. Get started in minutes!

footer.description: Revolutionizing the food and beverage industry through innovative digital solutions.

meta.title: Eatoes - Smart Restaurant Management Solutions
meta.description: Boost your restaurant's growth with digital menus, WhatsApp ordering, and smart reservations. All the tools you need to delight customers and increase revenue.

meta.title: Terms of Service - Eatoes
meta.description: Read our terms of service to understand your rights and responsibilities when using Eatoes restaurant management solutions.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Eatoes services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content: Eatoes provides digital solutions for restaurant management, including but not limited to digital menus, WhatsApp integration, and reservation systems.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality of Eatoes services are owned by Eatoes and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Eatoes shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services immediately, without prior notice, for any breach of these Terms of Service.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@eatoes.com

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: This website, including all information, tools and services available from this site to you, the user, is conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.

onlineStore.title: Online Store
onlineStore.content: By agreeing to these Terms of Service, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence.
